solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public List<List<String>> groupAnagrams(String[] strs) {--newline--        if (strs == null || strs.length == 0) return new ArrayList<List<String>>();--newline--        Map<String, List<String>> map = new HashMap<String, List<String>>();--newline--        for (String s : strs) {--newline--            char[] ca = s.toCharArray();--newline--            Arrays.sort(ca);--newline--            String keyStr = String.valueOf(ca);--newline--            if (!map.containsKey(keyStr)) map.put(keyStr, new ArrayList<String>());--newline--            map.get(keyStr).add(s);--newline--        }--newline--        return new ArrayList<List<String>>(map.values());--newline--    }--newline--}
